message:
Mohamed Meligy , i see you in timeline sharing the same post on your groups , 
may i introduce my small app for doing that for you and save your time !
http://eslamx.com/Apps/FbShare/
caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

data.message:
Thanks Eslam. I don''t do this quite often anyway, and I check every group first for certain criteria before posting, so, it's meant to be a bit of a manual process.
But sure I knew about your app mentioned here before, and it is a very useful idea :)
thanks in advance , and i have read your blog post about the hiring for readify , you give me a lot of excitement to work hard until i graduated to apply for hiring in readify :)
